# [Interview #428: BarnesandNoble.com Book Club Q&A with Brandon Sanderson, Entry #83](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=428#83)

#### Chaos2651

Will Sazed appear at all in the Stormlight Archive?

#### Brandon Sanderson

There are no current plans for him to do so.
